content: this charted pattern is worked with 2 colors at a time it is constructed in the round starting with a 2x2 ribbing with size 2 needles then adding a latvian braid then switching to size 3 needles to work the chart knit picks palette fingering weight 100% wool yarn lingonberry heather 76 yds salsa heather 51 yds kumquat heather 20 yds blossom heather 20 yds oyster heather 25 yds mai tai heather 20 yds
